name: Sam and the Womp
description:
'''Sam and the Womp''' are a British pop group consisting of trumpeter Sam Ritchie and Dutch-born vocalist [[Bloem de Ligny]], also known as Lady Oo. The band's music mixes [[Traditional music|traditional]] elements of [[Balkan brass music|Balkan music]] with modern [[Dub music|dub]] and [[Drum and bass|drum 'n' bass]] elements. From its formation in 2009 to 2014, the band also included producer Aaron "Audio" Horn, the son of musician and producer [[Trevor Horn]].

The group's debut single "[[Bom Bom]]" was released as a digital download on 19 August 2012, and hit number one on the [[UK Singles Chart]]. It has sold over a million copies worldwide. In 2012, they signed to [[Stiff Records]] and One More Tune.

WOMP Records are trying to create a Vol 2 as well as a Double CD package Featuring Sam.
